item.title: ASP.NET Core with Tabulator for Creating Dynamic Tables with Pagination, Filtering and Sorting
item.author: Author
item.description:
Tabulator is a Javascript framework for creating Data Driven Tables that provides lots of functionality out of the box for server-side as well as front-end: sorting, filtering, exporting and many many more awesome features. Having used tools like: Handsontable, Datatables as well as custom Razor Pages; I decided to try Tabulator, and found it to be the optimal solution that provides all of the functionality that I want at no cost, with great flexibility, and requires a relatively small amount of front-end code. In this article, I will give you a tour of how this awesome Javascript framework works effectively with ASP.NET Core and EntityFramework.

All of the code from this article can be found here.
